document_data.name: Aria of Peace
document_data.school2e: [[Enchantment/Charm]],The [[Provinces of magic|province of magic]] is not stated in the source. As a Zakharan spell that manipulates [[Air (element)|air]], it would belong to the [[Wind (province)|province of wind]]. The [[school of song]] is also not stated, but the spell fits into the school's description.
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite dragon/242/Arcane Lore: Magic of Sight and Sound}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aria of peace''''' was a powerful [[enchantment]] [[spell]] used to stop hostile interactions.
document_data.Effects: This spell created soothing melodies of different instruments within the area of effect around the caster. Listeners who were charmed by these sounds ceased all violent activities. The tunes could be kept up by the caster through concentration and then lasted some time longer, giving the caster the chance to settle the situation with more permanent means.
document_data.Components: This spell required verbal components only.
document_data.History: ''Aria of peace'' was the most powerful of the "magics of sight and sound" collected by [[Faer√ªn]]ian master [[bard]] [[Morion (bard)|Morion]] in his [[Morion's spellbook|special spellbook]]. It saw widespread use within [[Zakhara]], but had a different name there. Possibly the spell was invented in the Land of Fate.
document_data.Users: ''Aria of peace'' was generally eschewed by evil spellcasters due to its nature.
